about.sectionTitle: Building the Future of the Web
about.description: I'm Alexandros "Midnight" Georgiou, a systems engineer and web developer driven by a passion for building modern digital experiences. With a strong background in infrastructure, security, and software systems, I approach web development with an engineering mindset — prioritizing performance, reliability, and scalability in everything I create.
about.descriptionSecondary: By day, I work as an engineer. By night, I build powerful websites and digital platforms through Midnight Media Studio, helping businesses transform their online presence using modern technologies like Next.js, Docker, and Cloudflare.
about.descriptionTertiary: My mission is simple: to create fast, secure, and future-proof websites that help businesses grow and stand out in the digital world.
